title: battery_xct_workflows: Open Jupyter Notebooks for Lithium-Ion Battery QA using XCT
description: A collection of open, reproducible Jupyter notebooks for quantitative analysis and quality assurance of lithium-ion batteries using X-ray computed tomography (XCT). The workflows include electrode overhang analysis, battery canister assesment, and unrolling of cylindrical jelly-roll structures into polar coordinates for quality assurance.
